indexhtml.definition: Anything that makes the earth dirty and unhealthy
A substance that is bad for the environment and the ocean
A community of plants and animals that live together
All living and non-living things in a certain area
Pieces of plastic that are smaller than 5mm
The ability for something to exist on its own and not have negative impacts
The range of different animals and plants in a specific area
Knowledge about a particulat problem or issue in society
